title: AI-Generated Kamala Harris Crowds
description:
# AI-Generated Kamala Harris Crowds (August 2024)

- **August 2024:** Claimed photos of Harris's large campaign rallies were **AI-generated fakes**
- Posted: **"There was nobody at the plane, and she 'A.I.'d' it"** [Source: Truth Social, August 2024]
- Photos were real; verified by multiple photographers and attendees [Source: Fact-checkers, August 2024]
- Photographers who took the photos confirmed they were genuine [Source: Reuters, AP fact-checks]
summary:
- August 2024: Claimed photos of Harris's large campaign rallies were AI-generated fakes
- Posted: "There was nobody at the plane, and she 'A.I.'d' it"

- Photographers who took the photos confirmed they were genuine
keyPoints: **August 2024:** Claimed photos of Harris's large campaign rallies were **AI-generated fakes**
Posted: **"There was nobody at the plane, and she 'A.I.'d' it"** [Source: Truth Social, August 2024]

Photographers who took the photos confirmed they were genuine [Source: Reuters, AP fact-checks]
